author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...LOW PRESSURE AREA OVER THE BAY OF CAMPECHE EXPECTED TO BRING HEAVY RAINFALL THREAT TO PARTS OF THE WESTERN GULF COAST... ...TROPICAL STORM WATCH ISSUED FOR PARTS OF THE COAST OF TEXAS AND NORTHEASTERN MEXICO...
summary:
...LOW PRESSURE AREA OVER THE BAY OF CAMPECHE EXPECTED TO BRING HEAVY RAINFALL THREAT TO PARTS OF THE WESTERN GULF COAST... ...TROPICAL STORM WATCH ISSUED FOR PARTS OF THE COAST OF TEXAS AND NORTHEASTERN MEXICO...
 As of 4:00 PM CDT Mon Jun 17
 the center of One was located near 20.3, -93.2
 with movement NNW at 7 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1001 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary - Potential Tropical Cyclone One (AT1/AL012024)
